title: Pun-Pao Steamed Buns
typeOfFood: Ovo, Chinese, Thai, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Situated on the main road facing the moat, this eatery offers only steamed buns. There are 2 different cases: one meat, one vegetarian buns (with a "jay" symbol). Buns are labeled with Thai and English cards. You point out which buns you want and then the staff steams them for you in an individual steamer. 3 tables for seating. Bring your own drink. Also an outlet on 4th floor of Maya Shopping Mall.
